edu.kings.cs232.project2

Class LinkedStack<E>

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.kings.cs232.project2.LinkedStack<E>
  • Type Parameters:
    E - Type of data stored for this entry
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    Collection, Stack<E>

    public class LinkedStack<E>
extends java.lang.Object
implements Stack<E>
    Realization of a stack implemented as a singly linked list. All operations are performed in constant time.
    Author:
    Maria Jump

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      protected static class  LinkedStack.Node<E>
      Node of a linked stack, which stores a reference to its element and to the subsequent node in the list (or null if this is the last node).

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private int size
      Number of nodes in the stack
      private LinkedStack.Node<E> top
      The head node of the stack (or null if empty)

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      LinkedStack()
      Constructs an initially empty stack.
